instruction.en:
Press and hold down the Reset button until the LED indicator turns on.
Release button and immediately press the Pair button and the remote will be set to pair mode.
The LED indicator blinking several times will indicate successful inclusion.

Reset...
When you can't successfully add a device, reset the device first.
Press and hold down the Reset button until the LED indicator turns on.
Release the button and immediately press the Reset button 5 times and the remote will be reset.
